link.Abstract: On Monday, the two stars Tweeted links to new collabs: "Birthday Cake," an extended version of Rihanna's track featuring Chris Brown, and Rihanna's remix of Brown's "Turn Up the Music."

content.div:
Did Rihanna tweet a racial slur against Chris Brown's girlfriend? The pair now appear to be engaged in a Twitter feud.

--

Speaking of Twitter wars, Snooki's fiance is currently in one with her ex-boyfriend.

--

At least Snooki is getting lots of Twitter love from her Jersey Shore costars.

--

Taylor Kitsch sent hearts (including a certain Dose.ca editor's) aflutter when he landed in Toronto yesterday to promote John Carter.

--

Meanwhile, Kitsch revealed a shoe-tying tip in GQ that he promises will change your life.

--

Jennifer Love Hewitt says she loves her boobs. We're guessing she's not alone.

--

Brangelina's kids even make dogwalking look badass!

--

Do you want to smell like Adam Levine? Now you can!

--

The cast of Parks and Recreation spilled lots of secrets about upcoming episodes at PaleyFest.

--

Speaking of Paleyfest, Zooey Deschanel revealed that New Girl producers have ordered her and Jake Johnson (who plays Nick) to tone down the chemistry. Um, did they see this week's episode?!

--

Whitney Houston reportedly left all of her money and property to daughter Bobbi Kristina. She'll get the first bit when she's 21, then more when she's 25, and the rest when she turns 30.

--

Canadian band Rush has fired a cease-and-desist letter at Rush Limbaugh, demanded he stop using their music.

--

Following her hospitalization last week, Tila Tequila is heading to rehab.

--

Is your favourite TV show in danger of cancellation? Find out in our TV Death Watch.

--

Keri Russell is returning to the small screen in a new FX spy drama. Felicity, we've missed you!

--

Talk about suffering for fashion: four pedestrians were sent to the hospital when a Kate Moss billboard fell on them.

--

Check back to Dose.ca throughout the day for your entertainment fix.

entry.title: Rihanna and Chris Brown Release Two Songs, World Collectively Gags

link.Abstract: On Monday, the two stars Tweeted links to new collabs: "Birthday Cake," an extended version of Rihanna's track featuring Chris Brown, and Rihanna's remix of Brown's "Turn Up the Music."
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: On Monday, the two stars Tweeted links to new collabs: "Birthday Cake," an extended version of Rihanna's track featuring Chris Brown, and Rihanna's remix of Brown's "Turn Up the Music."
link.title: On Monday, the two stars Tweeted links to new collabs: "Birthday Cake," an extended version of Rihanna's track featuring Chris Brown, and Rihanna's remix of Brown's "Turn Up the Music."

link.Abstract: According to sources, Rihanna and Chris Brown are heating up again – at least in the studio.
link.title: Are Rihanna and Chris Brown Hooking Up to Make Music? Or Just Hooking Up?

link.Abstract: A pile of famous folks took to Twitter to voice their disgust with the Grammys' Chris Brown love-fest, and Brown responded by telling them to "f*ck off."
link.title: Update: Unapologetic Chris Brown Tells Haters to 'F*ck Off'

link.Abstract: Chris Brown lost a request to reduce his five-year probataion sentence. Still, expect to see the pop star at the Grammy Awards Sunday, playing the same stage as Rihanna.
link.title: Chris Brown Loses Plea To Reduce Probation (He's Still Playing the Grammys, Though)

link.Abstract: According to Us Weekly, Rihanna and Chris Brown have been secretly hooking up for nearly a year.
link.title: Are Rihanna and Chris Brown Hooking Up...Again?

link.Abstract: Despite hookup rumours, Rihanna and Chris Brown reportedly kept their distance at an L.A. hotspot earlier this week.
link.title: Rihanna and Chris Brown Ignore Each Other at L.A. Nightclub

link.Abstract: Chris Brown reportedly smashed a window after an interview on Good Morning America.
link.title: Chris Brown Reportedly Storms off GMA Set, Smashes Window

entry.title: Chris Brown Could Face Jail after Allegedly Stealing a Woman's iPhone

link.Abstract: According to a police report, Chris Brown called a fan a b*tch before stealing her iPhone outside of a Miami club.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: After Spann took a photo, Brown reached through the window of his Bentley and took her iPhone from her hands, saying, "B----, you ain't going to put that on no website” before rolling out, according to reports.
link.title: After Spann took a photo, Brown reached through the window of his Bentley and took her iPhone from her hands, saying, "B----, you ain't going to put that on no website” before rolling out, according to reports.

link.Abstract: Chris Brown has been hurling insults at WWE champion CM Punk since the wrestler Tweeted about the pop star earlier this week. Punk has since posted a video challenging Brown to a fight, with the benefits going to a women's shelter.
link.title: WWE Wrestler Challenges Chris Brown to a Match

link.Abstract: The admitted woman-beater hit on an employee of Lasio Professional Hair Care's Grammy gift lounge using one of the most disturbing pick-up lines ever.
link.title: Chris Brown Reportedly Uses "I Promise I Won't Beat You" As Pick-Up Line; World Collectively Gags
